dict.string: Your goal is to complete the machine by creating at least one final product for each of its six attachment points.

You can [nest](glossary://nest) loops by putting one inside another. Nesting loops allows you try many combinations quite quickly! - callout(Example): ``` let items = [Item.stone, Item.cloth, Item.metal, Item.dirt, Item.DNA] let colors = [Light.red, Light.green, Light.blue]
for item in items { for color in colors { setItemA(.DNA) setItemB(item) switchLightOn(color) forgeItems() } } ```
